@ Vallhael

I found this game to be really buggy and also couldnt get the damn thing to load!!

When you install the original SKIDROW release, make sure you tick all three boxes at the end of the install. Let it install EVERYTHING.

Install your gfx driver to latest available.

Install the UPDATE

Then it will work

@ HTC_guy

Two of those installs (directX & dotnet) just didn't work on the original installer for me, but afterwards I found them in a folder called 'dependencies' in the install directory.... still not working, with or without crack files, with or without steam open.

What I noticed is that there's only the 'steam_api.dll' file that needs overwriting when copying cracks over. 
steam_appid and steamclient.dll dont exist in the destination folder anyway... :S


@burningbannas
No I believe it is just an update, you need the original too. GL
